title: [ConvertMyFile] SecurityError: Storage access denied
body:
## Error Details
- Extension: ConvertMyFile v5.1.0
- Message: Storage access denied
- Fingerprint: cmf-512
- Timestamp: 2025-03-18T18:45:00Z

## Stack Trace
```
SecurityError: Storage access denied
    at shared/security/crypto.js:120:9
    at background/auth.js:52:11
    at shared/user-data.js:33:5
```

## Breadcrumbs
1. OAuth login completed
2. Background requested encryption key
3. Storage read was rejected by browser
